slogan: Creative Development for Startups and Game Developers

team.name: Max Louis
team.bioHtml: Oleso managing director. Turning the social media marketing industry on its head, in high volumes, for SMEs.

jobs.title: Production Manager
jobs.description:
We’re looking for an experienced and energetic production/project manager to join MLC full-time!

Who are we?
We’re a tight-knit family of creatives helping game studios build the games of their dreams and innovative startups and small businesses to create the best content they can! We have a welcoming and friendly team of remote freelancers around the world who have worked with us for 2+ years. We work with clients who have as much passion and drive as we do. If you want to work on projects you love and value happiness, then you might have just got lucky finding us!

What you won’t find

Politics
Boredom
Creative constraints

How we thrive

Diversity with similar values
Clear goals
Relaxed but structured
Unity and being human
Care and a “best all the time” attitude

Role Responsibilities

You’ll be tasked with running multiple creative projects including marketing content creation, animation, game development, and brand building. Some of your responsibilities:

Managing client communication
Managing our remote network and team of creative freelancers
Building and growing remote project teams
Overseeing creative processes and tracking progress
Creating and using methods and systems to achieve the best results possible with your projects

Requirements

At least 2 years experience running and owning creative or marketing projects
At least 2 years experience building and running teams
Proven success story(ies) – show off!
Creative thinking
A creative skill such as design, video production or 3D modeling
Be able to work in a fluid team with remote contractors from around the world
Get-it-done attitude with a strong passion
Clear with what you want in your career and a drive to get it

Bonus

Understanding of Adobe Suite
Experience in game development
Experience building websites and in HTML, CSS and Javascript
